Name: Proyecto Mirador Enhanced Distribution of Efficient Woodstoves
RecordTypeId.Name: VER
Project_Description__c: Proyecto Mirador (PM) is a non-profit organization that sells Gold Standard carbon offsets to finance the construction of Dos por Tres fuel efficient stoves in Honduras. Dos por Tres stoves remove toxic smoke from homes, reduce CO2 emissions, save trees and create jobs. Mirador has built over 100,000 stoves since inception. In 2014 Mirador registered a Gold Standard PoA (Programme of Activities) that contains all updated project documentation (see https://products.markit.com/br-reg/public/master-project.jsp?project_id=103000000001450)
SDG_Goals__c: 1 - No Poverty;2 - Zero Hunger;3 - Good Health and Well-Being;4 - Quality Education;5 - Gender Equality;7 - Affordable and Clean Energy;8 - Decent Work and Economic Growth;12 - Responsible Consumption and Production;13 - Climate Action;15 - Life On Land;16 - Peace, Justice, and Strong Institutions

Name: Grassland Preservation
RecordTypeId.Name: VER
Project_Description__c: Increased drought and wildfire risk can make grasslands more reliable carbon sinks than trees. This project promotes the generation and preservation of grassland to sequester carbon. An individual or a group of landowners with significant grassland acreage in areas that are otherwise suitable for conversion to cropland must place their land into perpetual conservation easements. Under an easement, activities that do not disturb the soil, such as livestock grazing, are still permissible on the land.
SDG_Goals__c: 9 - Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure;12 - Responsible Consumption and Production;13 - Climate Action;15 - Life On Land

Name: Co-processing of biofeedstocks at refinery
RecordTypeId.Name: Internal
Basis__c: GHG savings are based on renewable diesel (RD) fuel having a lower GHG intensity than its fossil fuel equivalent, ULSD. The GHG intensity varies on a batch by batch basis and is calculated based on the specific energy density and carbon emission factors of each batch, sourced from Annex 3 of Renewable Energy Directive (RED). This complies with the International Sustainability and Carbon Certification (ISCC) system.
Methodology__c: Other - ISCC principles were audited by Control Union. GHG Methodology from 2009/28/EC (RED 1) (ISCC) Annex 5
Project_Description__c: Refinery in the UK now manufactures fules with a lower carbon footprint by co-processing vegetable oil with fossil fuel feedstocks.
SDG_Goals__c: 9 - Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure;12 - Responsible Consumption and Production
